casebody.data:
Department of Transportation
v.
Adams Outdoor Advertising of Charlotte Limited Partnership No. 206P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Kenneth A. Sack, Assistant Attorney General, Dahr Joseph Tanoury, Associate City Attorney, for Department of Transportation. Craig D. Justus, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Adams Outdoor Advertising of Charlotte Limited Partnership. John F. Maddrey, Solicitor General.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the notice of appeal from the North Carolina Court of Appeals, filed by the Defendant on the 24th of May 2016 in this matter pursuant to G.S. 7A-30, and the motion to dismiss the appeal for lack of substantial constitutional question filed by the Plaintiff, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: the motion to dismiss the appeal is

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
